law.catch_line: Rights of disabled child, parent, or guardian being served by the system.
law.history: Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, secs. 92 and 95, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 313, sec. 12, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/96). This statute was amended by 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, secs. 92 and 95, which are in conflict. Section 95 prevails as the last section in order of position. See Home Folks Mobile Homes, Inc. v. Revenue Cabinet, Ky. App., 700 S.W. 2d 75 (1985).
